articles.content: Russell T Davies was questioned on his casting choices for It's a Sin. (Matthew Horwood/Getty)Journalist Andrew Marr has asked Russell T Davies if casting gay actors in gay roles will “deprive audien… [+3431 chars]

articles.title: Edinburgh mourns as Andy Gray, the king of panto, takes his final bow - Edinburgh News
articles.description: The first time I interviewed Andy Gray, he was playing Nicely Nicely Johnson in a production of Guys and Dolls at the Royal Lyceum. It was 2001.
articles.content: He made me laugh from the beginning to end of that chat. I knew he would. We'd met socially before and Id quickly discovered he was the rarest of performers, a man who simply had funny bones. He star… [+5448 chars]
